item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, December 23, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Palantir and Anduril join forces with tech groups to bid for Pentagon contracts
2. Qatar will ‘stop’ EU gas sales if fined under due diligence law
3. [Opinion] Trump and the power of Mar-a-Lago
4. Nick Candy vows to help Reform disrupt British politics ‘like we have never seen’
5. Trump’s transition team seeks to pull US out of WHO ‘on day one’
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, December 23, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
